title: Methods of protection
fullText:
Basic protection shall be provided by one or any combination of the following methods:
• (a) Insulation, in accordance with Clause 1.5.4.3.
• (b) Barriers or enclosures, in accordance with Clause 1.5.4.4.
• (c) Obstacles, in accordance with Clause 1.5.4.5.
• (d) Placing out of reach, in accordance with Clause 1.5.4.6.
RCDs are not recognized as a sole means of basic protection against contact with live parts but may be used to augment one of the above methods.
